Package com.thalesgroup.tmgsdk.mastercard

Interface TokenBindingListener

  • public interface TokenBindingListener
    This callback is used to inform the result of the MastercardTAFHelper.createBinding(String, String, TokenBindingListener) (String, String, TokenBindingListener)} process.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Version:
    3.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDeviceAuthentication​(DeviceAuthentication deviceAuthentication)
      This is the callback for app to indicate the type of device authentication used such as biometric authentication.
      void onError​(TMGClientException tmgClientException)
      This is the callback that the app will use to indicate when the token binding to device fails.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(IDVSession idvSession, TMGClientException tmgClientException)
      This is the callback that the app will use to indicate when the activation fails.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(IDVSession idvSession)
      This is the callback that the app will use to show the issuer's activation screen to continue the IDV process.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(IDVSession idvSession)
      This is the callback that the app will use to indicate activation is required when IDVMethod is chosen and sent to the server.
      void onSuccess()
      This is the callback that the app will use to indicate when the token binding to device is successful.

    • Method Detail

      • onIssuerAuthenticationReady

        void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(@NonNull
                                 IDVSession idvSession)
        This is the callback that the app will use to show the issuer's activation screen to continue the IDV process. The next step is to validate the OTP according to the selected IDVMethod.
        Parameters:
        idvSession - The object to be used for activation.

      • onIssuerAuthenticationRequired

        void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(@NonNull
                                    IDVSession idvSession)
        This is the callback that the app will use to indicate activation is required when IDVMethod is chosen and sent to the server. The next step is to show the available IDVMethod and then choose an IDV method from the list.
        Parameters:
        idvSession - The object to be used for activation.

      • onIssuerAuthenticationError

        void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(@Nullable
                                 IDVSession idvSession,
                                 @NonNull
                                 TMGClientException tmgClientException)
        This is the callback that the app will use to indicate when the activation fails. The binding session is kept opened and it is possible to retry.
        Parameters:
        idvSession - The object to be used for activation. This is returned when it is possible to retry the activation.
        tmgClientException - Returns the error code and message.
        Possible errors:
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_WRONG_OTP
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_IDV_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_EXPIRED_OTP
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_OTP

      • onDeviceAuthentication

        void onDeviceAuthentication​(@NonNull
                            DeviceAuthentication deviceAuthentication)
        This is the callback for app to indicate the type of device authentication used such as biometric authentication.
        Parameters:
        deviceAuthentication - Object to start the authentication

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        This is the callback that the app will use to indicate when the token binding to device is successful.

      • onError

        void onError​(@NonNull
             TMGClientException tmgClientException)
        This is the callback that the app will use to indicate when the token binding to device fails.
        Parameters:
        tmgClientException - Returns the error code and message.
        Possible errors:
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_PARAMETERS
        • TMGClientException.JSON_PARSING_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_DEVICE_AUTHENTICATION_PARAM
        • TMGClientException.DEVICE_AUTHENTICATION_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • TMGClientException.CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.TOKEN_NOT_BOUNDED
        • TMGClientException.ATTESTATION_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_IDV_METHOD
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_IDV_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_NO_SESSION_FOUND
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_TOKEN_STATE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_IS_NOT_ACCESSIBLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_RETRYABLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR
